properties.name: slow-sql-monitor.elasticsearch.uris
properties.description: Comma-separated list of the Elasticsearch instances to use.

properties.name: slow-sql-monitor.elasticsearch.connection-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout used when communicating with Elasticsearch.

properties.name: slow-sql-monitor.elasticsearch.socket-timeout
properties.description: Socket timeout used when communicating with Elasticsearch.

properties.name: slow-sql-monitor.elasticsearch.path-prefix
properties.description: Prefix added to the path of every request sent to Elasticsearch.

properties.name: slow-sql-monitor.elasticsearch.index-prefix
properties.description: Prefix added to the path of every index from Elasticsearch.

properties.name: slow-sql-monitor.elasticsearch.send-millis
properties.description: Sql execute millis used when send data to Elasticsearch.
